title: Create a CronJob
description: Create a CronJob named ||daily-job|| that runs every day at midnight using image ||busybox:1.31.0|| and command ||'echo Hello World'|| in the ||venus|| namespace.

steps: kubectl create cronjob daily-job --schedule='0 0 * * *' --image=busybox:1.31.0 -n venus -- echo 'Hello World'

validations.description: CronJob should exist in venus namespace

validations.command: kubectl get cronjob daily-job -n venus -o jsonpath='{.spec.schedule}'
validations.description: CronJob should have correct schedule (midnight daily)
